title: Where to buy a new rune page
body: Trying to figure out where they put the option to buy new rune pages in the shop, can someone please walk me through where it is?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: The rune page is hiding right now, but it's there.  When you go to the rune section of the store, switch from Tier 3 on the left hand menu to Show All.  This will make the rune pages appear!
